page.title: 18TRAVELLING FROM OAKAMOOR
page.content: There are only four bus journeys a day between Cheadle,Oakamoor and Uttoxeter (none on Sundays) and it costs 376p return for a family of four to travel between Oakamoor and Cheadle.Not many people travel on the buses.There are no buses after 5pm so you can only go out in the evening if you can walk the 3.5 miles home, beg a lift or have a car. Most of the people who don't have a car are children,teenagers, housewives and elderly people. It is lovely to live in the village if you have a car. Then you can enjoy the countryside, but still travel to work, the shops and entertainment.The number of families with cars is increasing.In 1981,129 households had one car(115 in 1971) and 51 had two cars (34 in 1971). 63 households have no car at all (87 in 1971).
